contentrichtext.text: '''Zbigniew Paleta''' (born 1942) is a Polish violinist and composer for [[telenovela]]s and the [[Cinema of Mexico]]. He is the father of actresses [[Ludwika Paleta|Ludwika]] and [[Dominika Paleta]]. They relocated to [[Mexico City]] in 1980. He also directed the music for the [[Cinema of France|French]] trilogy ''[[Three Colors]]'' (''[[Three Colors: Red|Red]]'', ''[[Three Colors: White|White]]'' and ''[[Three Colors: Blue|Blue]]''). ==Awards== *[[Ariel Award in 1998]] by the [[Mexican Academy of Film]] **''Musical score'' for ''[[Libre de culpas]]''. **''Best song'' for ''Libre de culpas'' ==Albums== * '' EL tri (Sinfónico, celebrando los 30 años de El tri) '', primer violin * ''[[El Tri]] [[MTV Unplugged]]'', violin ==Telenovelas== * ''[[Prisionera de amor]]'' (1994) ==Films== ===Mexico=== * ''[[Knórosov. El desciframiento de la escritura Maya]]'' (2000), original music * ''[[Brisa de Navidad]]'' (1999), original music * ''[[Al borde]]'' (1998), original music * ''[[Libre de culpas]]'' (1996), original music * ''[[4 maneras de tapar un hoyo]]'' (1995), original music * ''[[La otra familia]]'' (2011), original music ===Poland=== * ''[[Trzy kolory: Bialy]]'' (1994), director * ''[[Miroslava (film)|Miroslava]]'' (1993), violin ==External links== *{{IMDb name|id=0657591|name=Zbigniew Paleta}} *[http://www.academiamexicana.com/academia/e40.htm 1998] [[Ariel Awards]]. *''[http://www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/tg/detail/-/B000000W6E Three Colors: Blue]'' soundtrack at [[Amazon.com]] *''[http://mtvshop.mtv.com/product.aspx?sku=63899018&loc=19227 ''El Tri Unplugged''] at [[MTV]] {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME =Paleta, Zbigniew | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = | DATE OF BIRTH = | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Paleta, Zbigniew}} [[Category:Ariel Award winners]] [[Category:Mexican composers]] [[Category:Mexican conductors (music)]] [[Category:Mexican violinists]] [[Category:Polish composers]] [[Category:Polish conductors (music)]] [[Category:Polish emigrants to Mexico]] [[Category:Polish violinists]] [[Category:Cinema of Mexico]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:1942 births]] {{Poland-composer-stub}} {{Mexico-composer-stub}}
